main: ^A baker, transporting his goods by hand cart, has an unlucky break- that being one of his cart's wheels. As his bread spills over the road, a nearby policeman stops traffic to assist him.

c-0: ^You hop out of the truck and quickly help the baker rein in his wayward grains, and the policeman notices you.
c-1: ^You shrink down in the car, attempting to make yourself unrecognizable.
c-2: ^You gun it, running over the baker's dozen or so loaves.
